name: universal-pocket
title: Universal Pocket
description: Save content to your Universal Pocket with ultra-fast commands
author: local-dev

commands.name: save-url
commands.title: Save Current URL
commands.description: Save the current browser tab URL to Universal Pocket

commands.name: quick-note
commands.title: Quick Note
commands.description: Save a quick note to Universal Pocket

commands.name: save-clipboard
commands.title: Save Clipboard
commands.description: Save clipboard content to Universal Pocket

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
